meanings.definition: A task that is part of a larger task.
meanings.sent1: Completing all the subtasks is necessary to finish the project.
meanings.sent2: The subtasks include research, planning, and implementation.
meanings.sent3: The subtasks decided to rebel against the main task leader.
meanings.sent4: Each subtask is like a puzzle piece contributing to the whole picture.
meanings.sent5: Remember, the subtasks are the building blocks of success.

meanings.definition: To divide a task into smaller tasks.
meanings.sent1: She subtasks the project to make it more manageable.
meanings.sent2: Subtasking can help in organizing complex assignments.
meanings.sent3: He subtasks his chores to avoid feeling overwhelmed.
meanings.sent4: Subtasking is like breaking a big rock into smaller stones.
meanings.sent5: Remember to subtask your work for better efficiency.
